desc: Substitute short entities to longer ones

examples.ori: SOCCER - JAPAN GET LUCKY WIN , CHINA IN SURPRISE DEFEAT .
examples.trans: SOCCER - Capital Cities and Tombs of the Ancient KoguryoKingdom GET LUCKY WIN , Josef von Sternberg IN SURPRISE DEFEAT .

examples.ori: Bitar pulled off fine saves whenever they did .
examples.trans: James Le Gros pulled off fine saves whenever they did .
